name: Acid Adder
desc:
Conjure a snake of translucent acid that is launched at a target within range. They must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
At the start of each of your turns while the spell is active you can spend 1 AP to launch the snake at another target within 60 feet of you.
author: Zombehking
